price: 这等人，以正道换取迷误，所以他们的交易并未获利，他们不是遵循正道的。
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَٰرَتُهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ish'tarawū al-ḍalālata bil-hudā famā rabiḥat tijāratuhum wamā kānū muh'tadīna
